name: Internal File Path Exposure (Strict)
description: Detects exposure of internal file system paths (Linux/Windows path prefix + min length + file type keyword). This is the strict rule (3+ conditions).

name: Internal File Path Exposure (Generic)
description: Detects exposure of internal file system paths (Generic Linux/Windows path prefix + any path content + file extension). This is the flexible rule.

name: Stacktrace Leak (Generic)
regex: (Exception in thread|Traceback \(most recent call last\)|Caused by:|at .* in .*:\d+)
description: Matches common stack trace patterns revealing file/line info.

name: ENV Secrets (Generic)
description: Detects common environment variables containing secrets (min 12 chars, must contain letter, digit, and special char). HIGHLY STRICT.

name: Laravel APP_KEY
description: Detects Laravel application encryption key (exactly 44 base64 chars, fixed structure).

name: DB Connection String
description: Matches DB connection strings with required protocol, 8+ char password with special chars, and a structured host name/IP.

name: Framework Default ENV Keys
description: Detects default framework environment keys that often contain sensitive info with a non-empty value.

name: JWT Token
description: Matches JSON Web Tokens (JWT) used for authentication (3 parts, each >= 10 chars).

name: AWS Access Key ID + Secret
description: Matches AWS Key ID (AKIA+16) near the Secret Access Key (40 chars) and the word 'Secret' or 'Key'. HIGHLY STRICT.

name: Google API Key
description: Matches Google API keys (AIza + 35 chars).

name: Stripe Secret Key
description: Detects Stripe live secret keys (fixed prefix + >= 24 chars).

name: Bearer Token (Specific)
description: Matches bearer tokens in HTTP headers or scripts (keywords + prefix + value >= 40 chars).

name: Generic API Key (Specific)
description: Detects generic API keys in code or configuration (key name + value >= 32 chars).

name: Private Key (PEM)
description: Matches private keys in PEM format (fixed structure).

name: Email Address
description: Matches generic email addresses.

name: Email in ENV
description: Detects email addresses defined in environment/config files.

name: Email + Password Same Line (HIGHLY STRICT)
description: Detects lines containing email, password keyword, and a strong password (>= 8 chars with special chars) within a close proximity (80 chars).

name: Session Tokens
description: Matches session tokens or cookies used for authentication (fixed names + value >= 20 chars).

name: phpinfo() Exposure
description: Detects phpinfo() output exposing sensitive server information.

name: Composer Lock Leak
description: Detects presence of composer.lock contents, may reveal dependencies (more strict matching).

name: PHP Errors
description: Detects clear PHP error messages or stack traces revealing file paths.

name: Laravel Debug Enabled
description: Detects if Laravel debug mode is explicitly enabled.

name: Google OAuth Client ID
description: Matches Google OAuth client IDs.

name: Facebook App Secret
description: Detects Facebook application secret keys (keywords + value >= 32 chars).

name: PayPal Secret
description: Detects PayPal client ID or secret keys (keywords + value >= 30 chars).

name: Stripe Publishable Key
description: Matches Stripe publishable keys (fixed prefix + >= 24 chars).

name: Square Access Token
description: Matches Square payment access tokens (fixed prefix + >= 40 chars).

name: Docker Credentials
description: Detects Docker or registry passwords in config files (keywords + password >= 10 chars).

name: Git Credentials (Hardcoded in URL)
description: Matches hardcoded GitHub credentials in URL (protocol + host + 8+ char password). HIGHLY STRICT.

name: NPM Token
description: Detects NPM authentication tokens in config files (fixed name + value >= 30 chars).

name: Internal IP Address
description: Matches internal/private IP addresses (10.x, 172.16-31.x, 192.168.x).

name: Exposed Cronjob
description: Detects scheduled tasks that may expose scripts (strict timing pattern + script extension).

name: Authorization Header Leak
description: Matches Authorization headers with bearer tokens (fixed header + Bearer prefix + value >= 40 chars).

name: SSH Known Hosts Leak
description: Matches SSH public keys in known_hosts files (fixed key type + value >= 40 chars).

name: Cookie Set-Cookie Header
description: Detects cookie values set in HTTP headers (fixed header + name + value >= 20 chars).

name: Cloudflare API Token
description: Matches Cloudflare API tokens in configs or scripts (keywords + value >= 40 chars).

name: DigitalOcean Token
description: Matches DigitalOcean API tokens (fixed prefix + value >= 40 chars).

name: GitLab Personal Token
description: Matches GitLab personal access tokens (fixed prefix + value >= 40 chars).

name: Supabase Service Key
description: Matches Supabase service keys (fixed prefix + value >= 40 chars).

name: Auth0 Client Secret
description: Matches Auth0 client secrets (keywords + value >= 32 chars).

name: AWS Secret Access Key (Standalone)
description: Matches AWS secret access keys (keyword + exactly 40 chars).

name: Azure Storage Key
description: Matches Azure Storage account keys (3 connection string parts + key >= 50 chars). HIGHLY STRICT.

name: GCP Service Account Key
description: Matches GCP service account private keys in JSON configs (3 required JSON fields + fixed key header). HIGHLY STRICT.

name: Heroku API Key
description: Matches Heroku API keys (keywords + exactly 40 chars).

name: Terraform Cloud Token
description: Matches Terraform Cloud API tokens (fixed prefix + value >= 40 chars).

name: Paystack Secret Key
description: Matches Paystack live secret keys (fixed prefix + value >= 40 chars).

name: Razorpay Key
description: Matches Razorpay live keys (fixed prefix + value >= 24 chars).

name: Mollie API Key
description: Matches live Mollie API keys (fixed prefix + value >= 32 chars).

name: Twitter API Key
description: Matches Twitter API keys (fixed prefix + value >= 45 chars).

name: Twitter Bearer Token
description: Matches Twitter bearer tokens (fixed prefix + value >= 50 chars).

name: LinkedIn Client Secret
description: Matches LinkedIn client secret keys (keywords + value >= 32 chars).

name: Instagram Access Token
description: Matches Instagram access tokens (fixed prefix + value >= 40 chars).

name: Slack OAuth Token
description: Matches Slack OAuth tokens (3 fixed parts + value >= 40 chars).

name: Android API Key
description: Matches Android Google API keys (fixed prefix + exactly 35 chars).

name: iOS API Key (Generic App ID)
description: Matches a generic pattern often used for mobile API keys (fixed prefix + value >= 40 chars).

name: Sentry DSN
description: Matches Sentry DSN URLs (protocol + key part + host).

name: Rollbar Access Token
description: Matches Rollbar access tokens (fixed name + value >= 32 chars).

name: New Relic License Key
description: Matches New Relic license keys (fixed prefix + value >= 30 chars).

name: ElasticSearch Auth
description: Matches ElasticSearch authentication URLs with a non-empty password (protocol + host contains 'elastic' + non-empty password).

name: TLS Certificate
regex: -----BEGIN\s+(CERTIFICATE|RSA PRIVATE KEY|PRIVATE KEY|EC PRIVATE KEY)-----[\s\S]*?-----END\s+(CERTIFICATE|RSA PRIVATE KEY|PRIVATE KEY|EC PRIVATE KEY)-----
description: Matches TLS/SSL certificates/keys in PEM format (fixed start + end lines).

name: Datadog API Key
description: Matches Datadog API keys (fixed prefix + exactly 32 chars).

name: Honeybadger API Key
description: Matches Honeybadger monitoring keys (fixed prefix + exactly 32 chars).

name: Node Debug Leak
description: Matches NodeJS error outputs and specific stacktrace file/line format.

name: Server Source Code Leak (PHP)
description: Detects PHP start tag followed by core operations (file/module imports) or superglobal variables, providing strong proof of server-side code exposure. (3+ conditions)

name: Server Source Code Leak (NodeJS)
description: Matches NodeJS module imports immediately followed by high-confidence server operations (like listening on a port, creating a server, or file system access `fs`). (3+ conditions)

name: Server Source Code Leak (Python)
description: Detects imports of common backend/utility libraries (Flask, Django, os, requests) OR function definitions that contain web framework routing or environment variable access. (3+ conditions)

name: Java Server Stacktrace Leak
description: Java server errors revealing file paths and line numbers (fixed format).

name: Directory Listing (Apache/Nginx/Generic)
description: Detects Apache/Nginx directory listings (common HTML/text signatures) and explicitly looks for the title and Parent Directory links.

name: Username + Password Pair (HIGHLY STRICT)
description: Detects leaked username/password pairs in close proximity (username keyword, password keyword, and strong password value >= 8 chars with special chars). HIGHLY STRICT.

name: Kubernetes Token
description: Detects Kubernetes service tokens (fixed header + 2 parts >= 30 chars).

name: Kubeconfig
description: Detects kubeconfig exposure (3 fixed YAML fields).

name: AWS Credential File
description: AWS credentials file signature (fixed profile header + fixed key name).

name: Webhook Secret
description: Matches webhook signing secrets (two keywords 'webhook/hook' and 'secret' + value >= 32 chars).

name: SQL Dump
regex: (DROP TABLE IF EXISTS|INSERT INTO `|-- Dump completed on|--\s*Host:\s*|--\s*Database:\s*)
description: Detects SQL dump files exposed (3+ common SQL keywords/structures).

name: WordPress SALT Keys
description: Detects leaked WordPress salt keys (fixed function 'define' + one of the key names + value >= 40 chars). (3 conditions)

name: WP Database Creds
description: Detects WordPress database credentials (fixed function 'define' + one of the key names + non-empty value). (3 conditions)

name: SSH Private Key
description: Matches OpenSSH private keys (fixed structure).

name: SSH Password in Script
description: Detects hardcoded SSH passwords in scripts (fixed utility 'sshpass' + fixed argument '-p' + strong password >= 8 chars). (3 conditions)

name: Slack Webhook URL
description: Detects Slack incoming webhook URLs (fixed structure and length).

name: SAML Certificate
description: Matches long SAML certificates (fixed format + minimum length/structure check for the content).

name: Private IP:Port
description: Matches internal IP addresses immediately followed by a port number.

name: Generic PHP Variable Dump
description: Detects code output that looks like a PHP variable dump (e.g., using `var_dump`, `print_r`).

name: Laravel/PHP Composer Vendor Path
description: Detects exposure of deep, specific paths within the Composer `vendor` directory, common in Laravel stack traces.

name: GoLang Stacktrace Leak
description: Matches common GoLang runtime error/panic signatures which can reveal internal structure.

name: Terraform State File
description: Detects exposed Terraform state files, which contain all infrastructure secrets and data (fixed format structure).

name: Mailgun Private API Key
description: Matches Mailgun private API keys (fixed prefix + value >= 32 hex chars).

name: GitLab Runner Token
description: Matches GitLab Runner tokens (fixed prefix + value >= 20 chars).

name: Django Debug Page
regex: (<title>Page not found at|You’re seeing this error because you have DEBUG = True)
description: Matches the exact signature of the Django DEBUG=True 404 page (including the DEBUG hint).

name: Django URL Patterns Leak
regex: Request URL:.*didn’t match any of these\.|Using the URLconf defined in.*tried these URL patterns
description: Matches the disclosure of all internal URL patterns, which exposes the application's structure.

name: Django Internal Admin
description: Detects the presence of the default `/admin/` endpoint, often a target for attackers.

name: Django /API Schema Leak
description: Detects the exposure of internal API schema paths (Swagger/OpenAPI).

name: Wordpress/Config Files
description: Matches common paths/files that should not be exposed publicly.

name: Service Account Key (SAK)
description: Matches generic Service Account Keys (SAK- prefix + >= 32 chars).

name: Internal Python Path
description: Matches deep internal paths within Python's environment, indicating file path exposure.

name: Composer Configuration Leak
description: Matches the key structural components of a leaked composer.json file, revealing dependencies and stability settings.

name: Generic Package.json Leak
description: Matches the structural components of a leaked package.json file, indicating a NodeJS project and exposing dependencies.

name: Explicit Directory Index File
description: Specifically looks for explicit file links to common index/script files within a directory listing structure (e.g., .php, .html).

name: Git Repository Files (Git Index)
description: Matches key internal Git files that indicate the exposure of the .git folder or source control info.
